live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38759.summary: Some customers in the Lower Mission area of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38759.title: June 22 – Kelowna (Lower Mission) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
